definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Pr 8:18, wealth, sufficiency (poet., almost wholly WisdLt, especially Pr; cf. 1. [[אוֹן]] p. 20 supr.)—abs. [[הוֹן]] Pr 1:13 + 15 t. + Ez Eze 27:12, Eze 27:18 (where LXX SyrVer Co [[הוֹנֵח]]); cstr. Pr 6:31 + 3 t.; sf. [[הוֹנׇ֑ךָ]] Pr 3:9; [[הוֹנֵח]] Ez Eze 27:27 + v:Eze 27:12, v:Eze 27:18 Co; [[הוֹנוֹ]] Pr 28:8; pl. sf. [[הוֹנַיִח]] Ez Eze 27:33—
with [[מָכַר]] + [[בְּ]] pretii, = high value, or price [[תִּעמכּׂר עַמְּךָ בְּלאׁ הוֹן]] Ps 44:13—i.e. cheaply, = ‘for no price at all’ (‖[[מחיר]]).
sufficiency, enough! in exclam. Pr 30:15, Pr 30:16 (so also LXX Targum, Aq Sym Theod a(rkei=).
